Title: How to reset password
Content: To reset your password, go to the login page and click 'Forgot Password'. Enter your email and follow the instructions sent to your inbox.

Title: VPN Setup Guide
Content: To set up VPN access, download the VPN client from the IT portal and use your corporate credentials to authenticate.

Title: Software Installation Policy
Content: All software installations must be approved by IT department. Submit a ticket through the help desk portal.

Title: Data Backup Procedures
Content: All critical data should be backed up daily. Use the automated backup system or manually backup to the shared drive.

Title: Security Best Practices
Content: Always lock your computer when away, use strong passwords, and enable two-factor authentication on all accounts.
